content.content: Project name: OP Name Service Author name and contact info (please provide a reliable point of contact for the project): Polly - contact@opname.id I understand that I will be required to provide additional KYC information to the Optimism Foundation to receive this grant: Yes I understand that I will be expected to following the public grant reporting requirements outlined here: Yes L2 recipient address: Will provide on acceptance Which Voting Cycle are you applying for?: Cycle 10 Which sub-committee should review your proposal? (Builders Grants, Growth Experiment Grants): Builders Grants Project description (please explain how your project works): Building on Optimism, OP Name Service is a universal name service for all web3 interactions (crypto addresses, information, social media ++) via a single decentralized identifier.OP Name Service is an open-source, decentralized and chain agnostic naming service, letting users register a .op or .optimism name on the Optimism Chain for use with any chain.We replace a users complex address with a human-readable identifier for all their web3 interactions, as a .op or .optimism domain name owned by holding an NFT.Users can use their .op or .optimism name as their web3 identity, linking their crypto wallets across any chain to a single identifier to send and receive crypto, link social accounts, and even use their name as a domain name for a website eg.(optimism.op or optimism.optimism)Additionally, 30% of sales of .op and .optimism names will be used to buy and burn OP on the Optimism chain.We are not only building for use on Optimism, but by any user, community or project that wants a cool .op or .optimism name as their web3 identity, or websites that want to use a .op or .optimism name as their website domain eg.(opname.op or opname.optimism)Additionally, in the future we plan to enable anyone to register there own custom domain endpoint eg.(.chain, .anything and etc…) which can be used by a project or community to establish their own unique identifier and on-chain branding. Which projects would be able to set their own usage, monetize and decide how they distribute their custom domain to their community. Website: In development Twitter: Discord/Discourse/Community: Other relevant links (including any demos): Additional team member info (please link): We are a European team with 2-7 years experience in the space. The team has a background in development, user experience and marketing with 5-15+ years experience in our respective fields. Please link to any previous projects the team has meaningfully contributed to: Our team has past experience working at GoDaddy, Microsoft and other web2 based companies. Additionally some members of our team have experience freelancing to web3 projects (Smart contracts, DApps, Dexs, NFTs and more) Relevant usage metrics (TVL, transactions, volume, unique addresses, etc. Optimism metrics preferred; please link to public sources such as Dune Analytics, etc.): Not applicable as currently in development and looking to launch around May 2023. We are aiming to achieve over 50,000 .op and .optimism domains registered within the first year. Competitors, peers, or similar projects (please link): Competitors would be other naming services, however on the OP chain there would be no fully native competitors offering the same currently. We would be focusing on both OP and none OP users, communities and platforms for .OP and .OPTIMISM domain names for usage for payments, web3 ID, and also as a website domain all completely decentralized!In the future we would be looking to develop further usage and utility, as well as form a DAO for governance and developments. Is/will this project be open sourced?: Yes Optimism native?: Yes Date of deployment/expected deployment on Optimism: 5/20/2023 What is the problem statement this proposal hopes to solve for the Optimism ecosystem?: - Blockchain addresses are extremely hard to remember or verify;- No native OP solution;- Lack of a .op or .optimism domain to showcase OP alignment, as a web3 ID to connect communities and users;- Ethereum native solutions are prohibitive/expensive to use; - Other solutions provide limited chain support and utility;- No custom domain support to enable individual communities to create their own unique domain eg(.anything); How does your proposal offer a value proposition solving the above problem?: OP Name Service lets users create a web3 identity usable for all things web3! As a native Optimism naming service users will be able to create .op and .optimism domains, as well as in the future custom domain names for communities and platform users needs. All fully decentralized and on-chain provided on Optimism.Users, communities and platforms will be able use their domain name as their web3 Identity, letting them easily use a human readable name to receive and send payments, link wallet addresses, link information and social accounts, and even be used as a domain or redirect domain for a website! Additionally, for any platform or community it will make it far easier for users to identify them, rather than using long hard to read and verify chain addresses.As a .op and .optimism name service provider it will unite the Optimism community under a unique and memorable name. With also future custom domains held on optimism it will drive constant usage and value to the Optimism chain. Why will this solution be a source of growth for the Optimism ecosystem?: As an Optimism Native naming service it will enable OP users, DApps, NFTs and communities to identify and support as part of the Optimism ecosystem. Additionally, it will provide continuous awareness to Optimism via the domains driving users to explore Optimism and Optimism ecosystem, while providing ongoing value as a native Optimism service that looks to expand to support custom domains in the future and bring a range of additional utility. As well as drive further usage of the Optimism network through minting and transferring OP native domains, and trading them on Optimism NFT platforms.We are already in contact with some projects regarding support of .op and .optimism names on launch. We have received confirmation from a couple projects that will support on launch. Additionally, we will be looking to collaborate with the Optimism ecosystem and provide each platform with a certain amount of free .op or .optimism names to airdrop to their community and other events, while also reserving Optimism project names for top projects and projects that take part in events. Has your project previously applied for an OP grant?: No Number of OP tokens requested: 50000 Did the project apply for or receive OP tokens through the Foundation Partner Fund?: No If OP tokens were requested from the Foundation Partner Fund, what was the amount?: None How much will your project match in co-incentives? (not required but recommended, when applicable): We will be contributing 30% of each domain sale to buying and burning OP (eg. 10 million OP in sales would be 3 million OP burned) How will the OP tokens be distributed? (please include % allocated to different initiatives such as user rewards/marketing/liquidity mining. Please also include a justification as to why each of these initiatives align with the problem statement this proposal is solving.): OP won’t be used for incentives, as we are applying for builder grant. Over what period of time will the tokens be distributed for each initiative? Shorter timelines are preferable to longer timelines. Shorter timelines (on the order of weeks) allow teams to quickly demonstrate achievement of milestones, better facilitating additional grants via subsequent proposals: As a builder grant the OP will be locked for 1 year and released after that period. We would request 20% upfront to help with some expenses, although appreciate if that is not possible. Please clearly define the milestones you expect to achieve in order to receive milestone based installments. Please consider how each milestone relates to incentivizing sustainable usage and liquidity on Optimism. Progress towards each milestone must be trackable: We would be launching our OP Name Service on Optimism to let anyone register a .op or .optimism domain name, and we will be partnering with Optimism projects and wallets for integration in their platforms. Why will incentivized users and liquidity on Optimism remain after incentives dry up?: As a builder grant we would have no OP for incentives, although after launch we will look to apply to the growth experiment to help grow Optimism. Please provide any additional information that will facilitate accountability (smart contracts addresses relevant to the proposal, relevant organizational wallet addresses, etc.): Smart contracts are currently in development and will be shared on launch, as for organization wallet address this will be provided on acceptance. Confirm you have read and agree to the Eligibility Restrictions (here): I have read the Eligibility Restrictions and agree to abide by their conditions
content.GPT-summary: The post is a draft proposal for a project called OP Name Service, which is a universal name service for all web3 interactions via a single decentralized identifier. The proposal explains how the project works, its value proposition, and how it will solve the problem of hard-to-remember blockchain addresses. The post also includes information about the author and team, as well as the expected deployment date and usage metrics. The post invites feedback and questions from third parties, and also extends to potential collaborations with the Optimism ecosystem.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
None

content.content: Punk Domains have been offering .op and .optimism domains for almost a year now.

Used Punk Domains for .fantom its not something I would ever recommend. This proposal sounds completely different and something that could bring decent value, they also seem to have an experienced team. I like how its mentioned the linking of any crypto address or information and especially using domain as website would be sick to have my website with .op or .optimism xD Btw Punk Domains are selling an NFT just with 0 utility and its not even a real naming service its like an NFT image just with a name as I have one and wished I never bought it as biggest waste of money ever. They also have 0 integrations with any platform and like less than 40 holders of their NFT in 9 months which is terrible. Also I looked now and they don’t even have .optimism unless they are snipping these guys proposal and now trying to release another version of their 0 utility NFT with 0 adoption or use.

content.content: GrantsOps:  As a builder grant the OP will be locked for 1 year and released after that period. We would request 20% upfront to help with some expenses, although appreciate if that is not possible.   The token lock would require a 12 month period. Making a request for usage of some funds for immediate usage is at the discretion of the deciding council and would require a detailed distribution schedule for the use of those funds. I don’t see any proper information about the distribution schedule after the 12 month time lock has ended. I also do not see a clear scope of work with milestones set out. This crucial information is missing for the application.     GrantsOps:  Please consider how each milestone relates to incentivizing sustainable usage and liquidity on Optimism. Progress towards each milestone must be trackable.   This quote below also does not answer the question clearly. It only states that there would be no OP for users incentives. Honestly I would rather see user incentives added into the framework of the grant somehow to contribute to the overall growth of the network during the token lock timeframe.     GrantsOps:  Why will incentivized users and liquidity on Optimism remain after incentives dry up?: As a builder grant we would have no OP for incentives, although after launch we will look to apply to the growth experiment to help grow Optimism.   So the website and smart contract is in development? Can you please explain to me how this project is considered Optimism native if there is no on chain metrics to share ?     GrantsOps:  Smart contracts are currently in development and will be shared on launch, as for organization wallet address this will be provided on acceptance.   I am curious because of this users comment. Is there any sort of metrics showing the track record of this project on Optimism network??? Is there any compatibility with the domains being sold beyond being an NFT ?     Gregster:  Btw Punk Domains are selling an NFT just with 0 utility and its not even a real naming service its like an NFT image just with a name as I have one and wished I never bought it as biggest waste of money ever. They also have 0 integrations with any platform and like less than 40 holders of their NFT in 9 months which is terrible. Also I looked now and they don’t even have .optimism unless they are snipping these guys proposal and now trying to release another version of their 0 utility NFT with 0 adoption or use.   It is concerning that this proposal was submitted with the lack of metrics for a builders grant and the expectation that immediate usage of the tokens would be allowed. That is a clear red flag that this project does not have the proper amount of dedication that the Optimism network is looking for when it comes to builders on the network. As described in the grant application template!

content.content: Adding on to @FractalVisions , even if we assume these initial proposal decisions, what are more benchmarks and projections figures for benefiting the OP Ecosystem?     GrantsOps:  We are aiming to achieve over 50,000 .op and .optimism domains registered within the first year.   Where is this estimation coming from? Can you add a more thorough breakdown of expectations on the amount of fees spent burning OP as well in combination with your matching co-incentive explanation? If we’re using 50,000 as a benchmark, what will this sales figure generate in fees to use to burn OP? ie. What are the expected costs of buying an .op or .optimism name?

content.content: Thanks for the proposal, I think the community must try to extract value from any proposal. An ID name ENS type is a good idea for helping users interact on multiple social networks or on-chain. While AttestationStation is good for citizen house, NFT would be great for token house to experiment. I also agree with @FractalVisions and @HCNAT0_NEU_Blockhain observations. Besides that, The OP burning idea doesn’t like it. OP inflation is decided by the collective and burning philosophy doesn’t fit with OP token uses (IMHO). Please stay around and keep improving your idea as a part of the OP community. Cheers

content.content: Hi matoken.eth from ENS protocol delegate here. Can you let us know a bit more about the technical features? Is it going to be a clone of ENS contracts or you are building some technical feature which ENS doesn’t have? Your proposal seems mainly focusing on incentive mechanism and the use of having own tld (.op/.optimism). Just to let you know that we have been working closely with Optimism team to provide ENS integration into Optimism.
